conbody.p: This document introduces how to stop a histogram.

section.title: Purpose
section.p: This document describes the various APIs used to stop a Histogram.
Once a histogram is created, it has to be stopped and destroyed to release the buffer space.

section.title: Procedure
section.p: The high level steps that can be used by a client to stop histogram are shown here:

li.p: Client sends StopHistogram() request to server to block histogram notifications from the server.
If more than one active histogram is present, deactivating one of them doesnâ€™t stop other active histograms from getting the data.

section.p: To know the basic steps for creating Histogram object, refer to Creating Histograms.
